abstract: Periodic table of the elements accepts names Nihonium, Moscovium, Tennessine and Oganesson for elements 113, 115, 117 and 118.

keywords.value: International Union of Pure and Applied Chemistry
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: Please welcome to the periodic table: Nihonium, Moscovium, Tennessine and Oganesson, discovered and then named by Japanese, Russian and American scientists.
snippet: Please welcome to the periodic table: Nihonium, Moscovium, Tennessine and Oganesson, discovered and then named by Japanese, Russian and American scientists....

headline.main: Four New Names Officially Added to the Periodic Table of Elements
headline.print_headline: Proper Titles: Periodic Table Adds Four New Names
